name: gccx
description: Transforms CPX (JSX like syntax) into asm-dom Virtual DOM

scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist es bin src/language.js
scripts.compile:jison: cd src && jison language.jison language.jisonlex && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run compile:jison && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=test jest index.spec.js
scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --ignore cli.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --ignore cli.js
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack --env.prod src/index.js dist/gccx.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack --env.prod src/index.js dist/gccx.min.js
scripts.build: npm run compile:jison && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:bin
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build

author: Matteo Basso (https://github.com/mbasso)
